title: The Audacity | Episode 81
itunes:title: The Audacity | Episode 81
description:
Could you imagine a man asking another man if he could touch his wife? We'll tell you what celebrities are nvolved. Large age gaps in relationships prove to be hard for certain couples including Tyrese. Plus, John Legend shares why he and Kanye's relationship is strained. Can you guess why?

The Final Question To Undress got real. There's a new tik-tok trend you won't believe!

If you want your question featured on the show, send us a DM @TheUndressingRoomPodcast

The Undressing Room Podcast is presented by Macy's. Head to www.theundressingroompod.com for more details.

August is here and it's all about back-to-school. Head to Macys.com/TheUndressingRoom and check out Lore'l and Eva's hottest fashion picks of the season.

Subscribe and check us out every Thursday.

Follow:
@theundressingroompodcast
@evamarcille
@starringlorel

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
